site_name: All Saints Catholic College, 75 St Charles Square, LONDON, W10 6EL
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by Condition 9 (Protection of trees during construction) of planning permission ref. PP/23/08054 dated 15th March 2024 (Proposed one form of entry expansion involving: a) erection of a three storey extension block to create 6 additional classrooms; b) internal reconfiguration of the main entrance/reception area, dining hall and unused changing rooms; c) renovation of existing block b south elevation facade and; d) works on 2no. playing pitches to renew the surfaces and reinstate a 2.4m high mesh fencing).
